mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification ( user_id, sender_id, type, target_id, message, is_read, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{senderId}, #{type}, #{targetId}, #{message}, #{isRead}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.user_id, n.sender_id, u.nickname AS sender_nickname, n.type, n.target_id, n.message, n.is_read, n.created_at FROM notification n LEFT JOIN user u ON n.sender_id = u.id WHERE n.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY n.is_read ASC, n.created_at DESC
SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{userId}
